author: MetaBallStudios
description:
In this video, we show several examples of nuclear weapons accidents in the United States, also known as Broken Arrows. In addition to showing the accident itself, we also simulate the event of a nuclear warhead detonating and its consequences. Goldsboro, Palomares, Yuba City, Damascus, and Thule are just a few examples shown in this video.
